transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ha ji sir, good afternoon.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Bol rahe hai, mera company ka naam hai Das Trading.
Customer: Ji ji ji.
Customer: To is saal hum jo renewal kiye the na, to uska jo GST bill tha, to mera kho gaya hai. Humko dobara bill ka copy chahiye.
Executive: Achha, sir jo invoice ka copy hota hai, jo aapne payment kiya hai, wahi na?
Customer: Ha sir, ha sir.
Executive: Okay, sir main aapko share karta hu. Sir, aapne ye jo helpline number pe call kiya hua hai, ha.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Sir, main apna personal number se aapko WhatsApp kiya hu to us pe aap message dal diya kariye, main wahin se aapko connect karke aapko jo bhi query hogi, main aapko share kar diya karunga.
Customer: Okay, theek hai. Yes sir, one minute sir, on call hi main aapko invoice share karunga.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Sir, baat karte samay kuch cheezein aap hame bata denge kyunki mujhe bhi aapko call karna tha ki aapko sir buylead wagera kaise mil rahi hai?
Customer: Bas theek hai sir, koi dikkat nahi hai.
Executive: Ji, aur sir jo main buylead aapko share kiya hua tha, wo uska matlab location wagera.
Customer: Wo to wo to open nahi hota hai, aap log kya karte hai open nahi hota hai.
Executive: Achha, to sir kya issue aa raha hai jab usko open karte hai aap to?
Customer: Kuch nahi dikhata, abhi bhi abhi bhi try kar rahe hai, kuch nahi dikha raha hai.
Executive: Okay, sir matlab wo link open nahi hota hai aap se?
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi, mobile se open hi nahi hota hai.
Executive: Okay, theek hai. One minute. Sir jab aap buylead connect karne pe aapke location ki hi buylead aa rahi hai ya phir dusre location ki bhi aa rahi hai? Aisa koi issue aa raha hai abhi aapko?
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi, mera to pura India India pura India ka hi hai.
Executive: Achha, aap pan India supply kar rahe hai?
Customer: Ha ha.
Executive: Ji. One minute sir.
Executive: Aur sir, ye aapka jo sir isme ek do cheezein aapke isme product wale mein missing hai. Jaise ki sir operator fars wagera tank machine overall India, ye sir 15000 ki price hai ya phir alag matlab iski koi aur bhi price hai? Kyunki sir isme price incorrect dikha raha hai.
Customer: Achha sir dikha raha hai, iska link bhej dijiye aap WhatsApp mein aapko bill bhej dijiye phir aapko hum.
Executive: Ha sir actually, yes sir hello. Hello. Ji sir kyunki sir aapne mujhe 96 wale number pe call kiya hua tha na, to usse ek ticket raise ho jati hai ki customer ko koi issue hai, theek? To mujhe on call hi sir wo cheezein discuss karke saari cheezein overall cheezein sahi karni hoti hai. Aur sir main aapko mail par karu, mail par karu ya phir aapko WhatsApp pe karu?
Customer: WhatsApp pe kariye.
Executive: Ha, one minute sir.
Executive: Sir ye aapka jo invoice hai, kitne trading mein Das Trading ke naam se hai, jo iska address hai 164 192 Tik Tikakawa Goda jo bhi hai sir, bus bus bus stand Dakshin Rewa.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Ji, one minute sir main isko download bhi kar lu.
Executive: Sir iske alawa aur bhi koi concern hai aapko jo aap?
Customer: Nahi abhi abhi abhi filhaal ke liye yahi hai.
Executive: Ji ji ji.
Executive: One minute sir main aapko share kar raha hu.
Executive: Sir kuch aapki deal closing hui hai ya phir matlab abhi chal raha hai kisi client wagera se baat?
Customer: Abhi chal raha hai sir client ke saath.
Executive: Ji, to aap kuch sir business mila hai ya phir abhi bhi matlab koi issue aa raha hai?
Customer: Nahi is saal mein abhi utna kaam karna kaam nahi hua hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Abhi thoda sa ye bhi chal raha hai, abhi utna kuch nahi hua hai, hum honest bol denge.
Executive: Achha. Koshish. Ji thoda sa humko dekhiye machine ka jitna lead jyada milega utna humko achha hoga.
Customer: Achha, aur sir main kis cheez mein personally aapko buylead share karu sir hame bata denge? Kis cheez ke main jyada buylead aapko consume karau?
Executive: WhatsApp mein aapka open kyun nahi hota hai, ye to samajh mein nahi aata hai.
Executive: Sir mail mail mein kijiye, koi dikkat nahi hai.
Customer: Ji ji ji, sir ye jo buylead main share karta hu aapko WhatsApp pe hi share karta hu.
Customer: Hmm hmm dikha hai humne open nahi hota hai. Abhi open ho raha hai, abhi abhi open ho raha hai.
Executive: Achha kyunki sir ye buylead maine Friday ko aapko do buylead share ki hui thi.
Customer: Hmm hmm abhi hua hai, theek hai open ho gaya hai.
Executive: Ji. Aur baki sir. Ji, aur baki sir ye jo aapka invoice hai, maine mail pe kar diya hua hai aur ek baar main aapko WhatsApp pe bhi share kar de raha hu, theek?
Customer: Ji ji theek hai. Ji aur koi issue nahi hai na sir aapko?
Customer: Nahi sir nahi sir nahi sir.
Executive: Achha koi bhi issue ho, koi bhi issue hoga to sir aap mujhe ek baar WhatsApp pe message dal dijiyega, main aapko wahin se connect kar lunga.
Customer: Jarur jarur jarur sir jarur sir.
Executive: Ji ji ji. Okay sir main aapko WhatsApp pe bhi wo share kar de raha hu aur mail par wo chala gaya hai, ek baar check kar lijiyega. Okay sir thank you.
Customer: Thank you thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs a copy of GST bill.

- Buyleads shared are not opening.

- Price incorrect for product 'tank machine'.



Resolution:

- Executive shared invoice copy on WhatsApp.

- Executive will share buyleads on WhatsApp.

- Executive will check product price discrepancy.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to message on WhatsApp for any issues.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- invoice, buyleads, gst, product price
